title.rendered: Cherryhill Road Private Residence in Oakville by <?php echo $name; ?>

content.rendered:
Project Description

This 4 Bdr house  in Oakville blends in with the neighborhood and has the “Oakville flavour”  to its design. We used a combination of stone and cedar shakes siding.

Share on facebook
Share on google
Share on twitter
Share on linkedIn

Project Details

Cherryhill Road Private Residence in Oakville

  • Client: Private Owner
  • Location: 225 Cherryhill Rd. Oakville, ON
  • GFA: 3,500 sq.f
  • Year Completed: 2017
  • Budget: $ 850,000
  • Architect:

Looking for Architects for your next project?

We have the best solution for your project. Quality and innovation to make your plans come true.

Get in Touch
Contact us
